abstract: This work was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (81672079 to CZ and 31800147 to ZL), the Open Research Fund Program of the State Key Laboratory of Virology of China (2019KF001 to ZL), the Outstanding Leaders Training Program of Pudong Health Bureau of Shanghai (PWR12018-05 to XL), and the Key Disciplines Group Construction Project of Pudong Health Bureau of Shanghai (PWZxq2017-15 to XL).
affiliations: National Natural Science Foundation of China (81672079 to CZ and 31800147 to ZL), the Open Research Fund Program of the State Key Laboratory of Virology of China (2019KF001 to ZL), the Outstanding Leaders Training Program of Pudong Health Bureau of Shanghai (PWR12018-05 to XL), and the Key Disciplines Group Construction Project of Pudong Health Bureau of Shanghai (PWZxq2017-15 to XL)
author: Xinghui Liu; Rui Liu; Muhammad Adnan Shereen; Zhili Niu; Kailang Wu; Huan Han; Zhen Luo; Chengliang Zhu; Fang Liu; Dong Li
title: The comparative superiority of IgM-IgG antibody test to real-time reverse transcriptase PCR detection for SARS-CoV-2 infection diagnosis
